oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-06-09 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 9, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performers Flatt & Scruggs, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Red Hayes, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Del Wood; Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Flatt & Scruggs; Chet Atkins; Jim Reeves
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified song, test band] -- Smoky Mountain Polka (Del Wood) [continued from part 1] -- Jim Reeves introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Rod Brasfield) -- Jim Reeves introduces Flatt & Scruggs -- Before I Met You (Flatt & Scruggs) -- Jim Reeves introduces Chet Atkins -- [Unidentified guitar instrumental] (Chet Atkins) -- Jim Reeves talks -- My Lips Are Sealed (Jim Reeves) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Jim Reeves) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Atkins, Chet; Flatt, Lester; Scruggs, Earl; Hayes, Red; Reeves, Jim
